channel.title: Xp counters and other stuff
channel.description:
i dont know if this is client sided or server sided
My xp counter isnt showing up on my stats page. this is what it looks like
regular: http://img651.imageshack.us/i/statsqd.png/
over attack: http://img718.imageshack.us/i/statsagain.png/
when i put my mouse over attack or anyother skill the xp doesnt show and my total level doesnt either can someone help me fix?
